name: Bananagotchi
description:
Oh no, you're a banana! And a parent! AND THERE IS ANOTHER PARENT!?
Work together to raise the monkey. Do not over- or underfeed them, but be careful! The monkey will play favorites once it is grown up...

CONTROLS

Player 1:
- Q to feed the monkey
- A or W to make the monkey poop
Player 2:
- O to feed the monkey
- L to make the monkey poop

Enter to restart the game

CREDITS

Design - GO RIA, Tialle
Programming - GO RIA
Art - Tialle
Made using Godot 3.3 and Photoshop

--------------------------------------------------

This game has been made for GORILLA JAM, but is not competing in the jam.
